message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $150. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe we can come to an agreement that's mutually beneficial. I kindly invite you to consider purchasing it at a special introductory price of $135. This offer is exclusive to you and won't be available once you decline. Don't miss out on this opportunity to save $15 while enjoying all the features of our top-tier product.
